titleInfo.title: In Re: New York County Cases
titleInfo.subTitle: Judge Patti B. Saris: ORDER entered. MEMORANDUM AND ORDER, granting (77 in 1:03-cv-10643-PBS, 6076 in 1:01-cv-12257-PBS) MOTION for Partial Summary Judgment filed by The City of New York and Captioned New York Counties, and denying (6052 in 1:01-cv-12257-PBS) Joint MOTION for Summary Judgment on Plaintiffs' "FUL Fraud" Claims filed by Merck&Co., Inc., (53 in 1:03-cv-10643-PBS) Joint MOTION for Summary Judgment on Plaintiffs' "FUL Fraud" Claims filed by Schering-Plough Corp.Associated Cases: 1:01-cv-12257-PBS, 1:03-cv-10643-PBS(Patch, Christine)
